actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin, and for other purposes.
short_title: Georgia Neese Clark (Gray) Dollar Coin Act

summary.text: Georgia Neese Clark (Gray) Dollar Coin Act - Amends the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin. Provides for the portrayal of the likeness of Georgia Neese Clark (Gray) on the obverse side.

titles.title: Georgia Neese Clark (Gray) Dollar Coin Act
A bill to amend the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin, and for other purposes.
